EmailTemplate.name: 2014 Haystak WAM Introduction Recap
EmailTemplate.subject: {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Account__c} Website has launched!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Contact__c},
Thank you for your time on the phone today.
As we discussed, {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.00N70000002tn5s} is your primary point of contact for any updates or questions you may have about your website moving forward. If there are any changes or concerns that youâ€™d like to discuss, your website account manager is a valuable resource to make sure your website is always correctly representing your dealership and staying up to date. In the event that your website account manager is not available, please call the toll free number or email your request to the support team.
Toll free: 844-877-4837 (844-URSITES) Email: websitesupport@haystak.com
Congratulations on your new website and thank you for choosing Haystak!
Sincerely, {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.OwnerFullName} {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.OwnerPhone} {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.OwnerEmail} Website Implementation Consultant
